section.36: The Book of the Kind Treatment of Women

hadiths.text: It was narrated that 'Aishah mentioned a similar report and said:"The wives of the Prophet sent Zainab and she asked him permission to enter and she entered." And she said something similar. Ma'mar contradicted the two of them; he reported it from Az-Zuhri, from 'Urwah, from 'Aishah
